revised_title: Invention and Description of a New Catoptric Micrometer
tldr: Mr. Ramsden describes his new catoptric micrometer, a device that measures angles using reflection instead of refraction. This micrometer has several advantages over previous models, including no aberration, no defects from imperfect materials, and the ability to measure the diameter of a planet on both sides of the zero point. The device is suitable for use with reflecting telescopes and could lead to further improvements in telescope design.
